channel.title: Whats wrong with this?

item.title: Whats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @i_owned_u_ha i owned u ha
item.description:
@i_owned_u_ha wrote:

i was trying to add prayer from sigex tut

and he said there is stuff wrong with it which i have to fix can anyone tell me whats wrong with this please?!?!?

first i fixed the send frame and stuff and then i got 4 error

the errors were this

 sendFrame174(,5,0);
                          ^

like 4 of those so i took out the , and then i got 23 errors…

whats wrong with this please tell me i will give prize if it works…

case 2173:// Smite //1/4 damage dealt is also removed from oppoet's Prayer //Level 52 type = 17; if(!premium ||playerIsMember <= 0) { sendFrame36(100,0); sendFrame174(5,0); sendMessage("you need to be a member server to use this Prayer."); } else if(premium && playerIsMember >= 1) { if(playerLevel[5] <= 0) { sendFrame36(100,0); sendFrame174(5,0); sendMessage("You need to recharge your Prayer at a altar."); } else if(playerLevel[5] >= 1) { if(playerXP[5] <= 123659) { sendFrame36(100,0); sendFrame126("You need a @blu@Prayer level of "+prayerLevel[type]+" to use "+prayerames[type]+".", 357); sendFrame164(356); sendMessage("You need a Prayer level of "+prayerLevel[type]+" to use this."); } else if(playerXP[5] >= 123660) { if(Smite) { sendFrame36(100,0); sendFrame174(5,0); Smite = false; headIco = 0; appearaceUpdateRequired = true; } else { Smite = true; clickSmite = true; sendFrame174(5,0); if(allowIcos) headIco = 16; calculatePrayerDrai(); calculatePrayerUse(); appearaceUpdateRequired = true; } } } } break;

Read full topic
